name: In Your Dreams (Basem Alasmar)
description:
Game was made in 3 days, no settings available.

Control :

A W S D - Movement

W  + Shift - Sprint

E - Use\ Take\ Open

Story :

A scared kid in the hospital waiting for his mother to wake up, the kid thinks that the doctors are killing her, he closes his eyes and dive into a dream to another.

running away from the doctor he thinks he wants to kill his mom.

Mission : 

Explore, find keys to locked doors, look for a way out!

Run from the doctor before he catches you!

Note :

Incase you couldn't leave the game please press: ALT + F4

Pause menu was not setup, and mouse curser is hidden.

Credits :

This game was made by Basem Alasmar and Muhmmad Aljuhani in 3 days.

Map elements:

Locker, Wheel chair, Hospital beds, Doors, Bathroom, Tables and computer elements | was taken from Sketchfab and are free to use.
